DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test the effectiveness of a video-based parent education intervention delivered in the primary care setting on parents and other caregivers discipline attitudes and practices.
DOC.criteria: Adult caregivers of children ages 12 to 36 months with a scheduled wellchild visit. Caregivers must be older than 18 years of age, must be considered a consistent caregiver for the child, must be the primary caregiver at least 2 days per week, and must live with the child. Caregivers previously enrolled in the study. Caregivers who do not speak or read English, Caregivers not able to give contact information for followup, Caregivers of a child who has a severe behavioral problem or developmental delay as reported by the parent during the initial recruitment phone call.
